description:
The perfect way to layer on some warmth. Our men's Red Slate Vest has performance for the great outdoors, and classic looks to elevate the everyday.

It starts with Responsible Down Standard (RDS) Responsible Down Standard (RDS) certified insulation, which ensures that the welfare of the birds providing down and feathers is respected at all times. From there, we add a layer of PFAS-Free DWR (durable water repellent) coating, keeping you protected if the weather takes a sudden turn.

Of course, we couldn't finish off the design without plenty of storage space. That's why you'll find dual-entry hand pockets with zippered closures for extra security, plus an interior zip pocket that's perfect for stashing a passport.
name: Prana Red Slate Vest - Mens
